text: I am a professional spy my job stealth
to choose gear that keeps me in
conspicuous that's why I choose the
Samsung gear watch in my business I need
my hands-free and my camera is hidden it
doesn't work unless you have a samsung
phone tablet either the note 3 or the
note 10.1 the phone tablet controls the
settings and the apps for the watch the
watch can show you Texas it can't show
you emails it refers you back to the
phone for that it can help you find the
phone if you've lost it on a mission if
you're within 25 feet of it it can even
make phone calls via the phone or tablet
in your pocket control come in I have a
lead on the mark I said I have a lead on
them the sound is loud and clear I said
I have a lead on the mark 10 minutes
well that was clear ah the design
inconsistent and frustrating double tap
with one finger to zoom in double tap
with two fingers to adjust the
brightness tap and hold two fingers to
see a list of recent apps but in my

just so the job gets done
you
